1:
Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good,
\q for his covenant faithfulness endures forever.
\q
2:
Let Israel say,
\q "His covenant faithfulness endures forever."
3:
Let the house of Aaron say,
\q "His covenant faithfulness endures forever."
\q
4:
Let the loyal followers of Yahweh say,
\q "His covenant faithfulness endures for ever."
7:
Yahweh is on my side as my helper;
\q I will look in triumph on those who hate me.
8:
It is better to take shelter in Yahweh
\q than to put confidence in man.
\q
9:
It is better to take refuge in Yahweh
\q than to put one's trust in a princes.
13:
They attacked me to knock me down,
\q but Yahweh helped me.
\q
14:
Yahweh is my strength and joy,
\q and he is the one who rescues me.
16:
The right hand of Yahweh is exalted;
\q the right hand of Yahweh conquers.
17:
I will not die, but live
\q and declare the deeds of Yahweh.
\q
18:
Yahweh has punished me harshly;
\q but he has not handed me over to death.
21:
I will give thanks to you, for you answered me,
\q and you have become my salvation.
22:
The stone that the builders rejected
\q has become the cornerstone.
\q
23:
This is Yahweh's doing;
\q it is marvelous in our eyes.
25:
Please, Yahweh, give us victory!
\q Please, Yahweh, give us success!
28:
You are my God, and I will give thanks to you;
\q you are my God; I will exalt you.
29:
Oh, give thanks to Yahweh; for he is good;
\q for his covenant faithfulness endures forever.
